document_data.mainbody:
rawler Rot was a goblin member of the cult of the Absolute who dwelled within the Shattered Sanctum during the late 15 century DR.
Rot had orange skin and long brown hair, that went down to his feet. He wore a leather cuirass and crude bracers adorned with bones.
His preferred weapon was a crudely-made goblin scimitar.
Rot was among the goblins that celebrated at the Shattered Sanctum the cults successful raid on Waukeens Rest, in the .
